name: twitch-extension-starter
description: This will get you started developing Twitch extensions using React!
author: Martin Beierling <mbeierling@gmail.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "parcel watch src/pages/config.html src/pages/live_config.html src/pages/mobile.html src/pages/panel.html src/pages/video_component.html src/pages/video_fullscreen.html -d dist --public-url ./" "yarn dev-server"
scripts.build: parcel build src/pages/config.html src/pages/live_config.html src/pages/mobile.html src/pages/panel.html src/pages/video_component.html src/pages/video_fullscreen.html -d dist --no-minify --public-url ./
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
